person.persName: Michael S. Lile (Private in the 3rd Kentucky Cavalry; Barren County Grocer)

body.p: A Kentucky grocer and soldier. Lived in Barren County, Kentucky in 1860. Served as a private in the 3rd Kentucky Cavalry (Co. E & G) from October 1861 to August 1863. Commissioned as a Lt. Colonel in the 46th Regiment of Kentucky Militia in November 1863. Declined commission in December 1863, due to wounds received while serving in the 3rd Kentucky Cavalry.
